summary: This is an email chain from October 15, 2019, arranging logistics for a meeting with victims of Jeffrey Epstein in West Palm Beach (WPB). The sender, currently in Miami for an 'Epstein victim meeting,' requests assistance in securing an interview room for meetings with victims scheduled for the following day.

persons.name: Rote
persons.context: Email recipient who is thanked for arranging a conference room and coordinating timing for a victim meeting in West Palm Beach.

events.title: Epstein Victim Meeting in Miami
events.description: The email author states they are 'presently in Miami for the Epstein victim meeting,' indicating a gathering related to victims of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: Planned Victim Meetings in West Palm Beach
events.description: A meeting with Epstein victims is planned for the day after the email (October 16, 2019) in West Palm Beach, requiring an interview room.

keyFacts: The email is dated October 15, 2019, and concerns logistics for meetings with Epstein victims.
The author is in Miami attending an 'Epstein victim meeting' and needs to arrange a follow-up meeting in West Palm Beach the next day.
A person named 'Rote' assists by securing a conference room and coordinating timing for the West Palm Beach meetings.
